name: Grey Wind
text: No attachments. Deadly. Dominance:kneel 2 influence to search your deck for Robb Stark and put him into play. Then, you may attach Grey Wind to Robb Stark (counts as a Retainer attachment with deathbound and the text "Attached character gains +3 STR") Then shuffle your deck. [doomed]

name: Lady
text: No attachments. Deadly. Dominance: kneel 2 influence to search your deck for Sansa Stark and put her into play. Then, you may attach Lady to Sansa Stark (counts as a Retainer attachment with deathbound and the text "Response: after you win a challenge in which attached character participated, draw a card.") Then shuffle your deck. [doomed]

name: Nymeria
text: No attachments. Deadly. Dominance: kneel 2 influence to search your deck for Arya Stark and put her into play. Then, you may attach Nymeria to Arya Stark (counts as a Retainer attachment with deathbound and the text "Attached character gains a [military] icon.") Then shuffle your deck. [doomed]

name: Summer
text: No attachments. Deadly. Dominance: kneel 2 influence to search your deck for Bran Stark and put him into play. Then, you may attach Summer to Bran Stark (counts as a Retainer attachment with deathbound and the text "Lower the influence cost to trigger attached character's ability by 1.") Then shuffle your deck. [doomed]

name: âˆž Trident Reinforcements
text: Dominance: return Trident Reinforcements from you dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.
flavor: "The red stallion was always a welcome sight in Riverrun." -Catelyn Stark

name: Aemon's Correspondent
text: Lower the cost to play Aemon's Correspondent to 0 if there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play.
flavor: "I felt not heat. Did you, Sam?" -Maester Aemon

name: Edmure's Van
text: Challenges: kill Edmure's Van (cannot be saved) to choose and kill an attacking character.
flavor: "This is Tully land." Edmure declared. "If Tywin Lannister thinks to cross it unbloodied, I mean to teach him a hard lesson."

name: Grim Defender
text:
X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile.
+X influence
[doomed]

name: Sullen Recruit
text: While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Sullen Recruit cannot be discarded from play.
flavor: "The Watch is not what it was. Too few honest men to keep the rogues in line." -Donal Noye

name: Icy Moat
text: Attacking characters without a [military] icon get -1 STR.
flavor: Path, steps, and door were in a straight line, which made you think the causeway ran straight, but that wasn't so. Under the lake it zigged and zagged, going a third of the way around the island before jagging back.

name: More Town Brothel
text: Discard Mole Town Brothel from play at any time there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play. Any phase:kneel 1 influence to choose and stand a defending character.

name: Reinforced Walls
text: Response: kneel Reinforced Walls and kneel 2 influence to save a location from being discarded from play.
flavor:
Winterfell was encircled by two massive granite walls, with a wide moat between them.
The outer wall stood eighty feet tall, the inner more than a hundred.

name: Gold for Bribes
text: Any phase: until the end of the phase, attached character gains a trait of your choice (limit once per round).
flavor: "Bribes might sway some of the lesser lords." -Lord Tywin Lannister

name: In Love with Cersei
text: Attached character gets -2 STR and loses an [intrigue] icon.
flavor: "Love's not always wise, I've learned." -Lord Robb Stark

name: Podrick Payne
text: Challenges: during a [military] or [power] challenge, choose an attacking character to get +1 STR. If that character is Tyrion Lannister, he gains an additional +1 STR and deadly. (Limit once per phase.) [doomed]

name: Ser Jacelyn Bywater
text: Immune to character abilities. Response: after Ser Jacelyn Bywater is killed, each opponent must choose and discard a card at random from his or her hand, if able.

name: âˆž Frey Outrider
text: Opponents cannot play attachments on Frey Outrider. Dominance: return Frey Outrider from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

name: Cersei's Attendant
text: Response: after Cersei Lannister or Cersei's Attendant is killed, choose and kneel a character.
flavor: Serving men cleared away the swan, hardly touched. Cersei beckoned for the sweet.

name: Exiled Asshai Courtesan
text: Response: after you play Exiled Asshai Courtesan from your hand, choose and kneel X characters. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile. [doomed]

name: Kingsroad Merchant Master
text: While there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play, Kingsroad Merchant Master gets +2 STR and gains "Response: after you win a challenge in which Kingsroad Merchant Master participated, draw a card.

name: Sacrificial Envoy
text: Challenges: kill Sacrificial Envoy (cannot be saved) to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender.

name: Slynt's Man
text: While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Slynt's Man gains "Any phase: kneel Slynt's Man to draw a card."

name: Lannisport Archives
text: Response: after you win an [intrigue] challenge, claim 1 power for your House (limit once per phase).
flavor: "Lannisport was the end of our voyage." -Prince Oberyn Martell

name: Undefended Port
text: Discard Undefended Port from play at any time there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play. Any phase: kneel Undefended Port to draw 2 cards.

name: Devan Seaworth
text: While any character you control has 1 or more power, Devan Seaworth gains stealth.
flavor: The boy wore a cream-colored doublet with a fiery heart sewn on the breast.

name: Edric Storm
text:
Stealth.
During [power] challenges, characters attacking you lose stealth and renown.
flavor:
Robert was a different man than Stannis, sure enough. The boy is like him. Aye, and like Renly as well.
[doomed]

name: âˆž The Lord's Assassin
text: Stealth. Dominance: return The Lord's Assassin from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

name: Blackwater Captain
text: Response: after you play Blackwater Captain from your hand, kneel X influence to have it claim X power. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile. [doomed]

name: Guardsman of the Arbor
text: Dominance: kill Guardsman of the Arbor (cannot be saved) to move 2 power from any House to a character.

name: Robert's Squire
text: Response: after Robert Baratheon or Robert's Squire is killed, shuffle your discard pile. Then, return on of those cards at random to your hand.

name: Stannis's Cavalry
text: No attachments. Deadly. While there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play. Stannis's Cavalry gains renown.
flavor: And yellow, so much yellow, yellow banners with a red device, whose arms were those?

name: Stannis's Personal Guard
text: While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Stannis's Personal Guard gets +2 STR.
flavor: King's men, not queen's men. But it would not do to boast of them.

name: Caverns of Storm's End
text: Response: kneel Caverns of Storm's End and 1 influence to save a character with at least 1 power from being killed. Then, discard all power from that character.

name: Crackclaw Point Tower
text: Discard Crackclaw Point Tower from play at any time there are more Wildling characters in play than Night's Watch characters. +1 initiative

name: Melisandre's Garden
text: Challenges: kneel Melisandre's Garden to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot attack or defend during [power] challenges.

name: Salladhor's Merchant Vessel
text: Challenges: kneel Salladhor's Merchant Vessel to choose and stand a character with a [power] icon.
flavor: But no, her hull was striped. She was Lysene, she was Salladhor Saan's.

name: Gevin Harlaw
text: Immune to events. Response: after a location is discarded from play, kneel 1 influence to have Gevin Harlaw or Theon Greyjoy claim 1 power. [doomed]

name: Stygg
text: Stygg gets +1 STR for each Warship location you control.
flavor: Tallhart, you've spit away your life. Theon though. "Stygg, silence him." he said.

name: âˆž Sea God's Disciple
text: Dominance: return Sea God's Disciple from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

name: Balon's Retainer
text: Response: after Balon Greyjoy or Balon's Retainer is killed, choose a [greyjoy] character to gain stealth and renown until the end of the phase.

name: Bay of Ice Buccaneers
text: No attachments. Deadly. While there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play, Bay of Ice Buccaneers gains renown.

name: Cotter Pyke's Men
text: No attachments. Deadly. While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Cotter Pyke's Men gains "Response: kneel 1 influence to save Cotter Pyke's Men from being killed. Then, Cotter Pyke's Men claim 1 power.

name: Euron's Servant
text: Dominance: kneel Euron's Servant to choose and discard from play a non-Limited location with cost X or lower. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile. [doomed]

name: Seagard Looter
text: Any phase: kill Seagard Looter (cannot be saved) to choose and kneel up to 3 locations.
flavor: Seagard had been built to defend the coast against reavers from the Iron Islands, the Greyjoy of Pyke chief among them.

name: Damphair's Chambers
text: Challenges: kneel Damphair's Chambers to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the phase that character gains deadly.

name: Fjords of Ironman's Bay
text: Discard Fjords of Ironman's Bay from play at any time there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play. Characters you control get +1 STR.

name: Goodbrother Interceptor
text: Response: kneel Goodbrother Interceptor to save a Warship location from being discarded. Then, stand that location.
flavor: Some of the sails bore the devices from other islands; the blood moon of Wych, Lord Goodbrother's banded black warhorn, Harlaw's silver scythe.

name: Pyke Drydocks
text: Any phase: kneel to choose a Warship location. Until the end of the phase, that location is immune to events.
flavor: Dreary, dark, forbidding, Pyke stood atop those islands and pillars, almost a part of them.

name: Festering Wound
text:
Attached character gets -3 STR.
Attached character is killed if its STR is 0.
flavor: The wound he had taken on his hip the night he fought Khal Drogo's bloodriders had never fully healed.

name: Horse Whip
text:
While attached character has exactly 1 attachment, it gains stealth.
While attached character has more than 1 attachment, it gets +2 STR and gains stealth and deadly.

name: Ser Jorah's Storybooks
text: Discard Ser Jorah's Storybooks from play at any time there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play. Any phase: kneel attached character to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character is immune to opponents' events and character abilities.

name: Brown Ben Plumm
flavor:
"Well," said Brown Ben, "there was some old Plumm in the Sunset Kingdoms who wed a dragon princess. My grandmama told me the tale. He lived in King Aegon's day."
"Which King Aegon?" Dany asked. "Five Aegons have ruled in Westeros."

name: Haggo
text: Response: after a [targaryen] character is killed, stand Haggo.
flavor: It had grown so silent in the hall that she could hear the bells in Khal Drogo's hair, chiming softly with each step he took. His bloodriders followed him, like three copper shadows.

name: Qotho
text:
Immune to events.
Qotho gets -3 STR while you control Daenerys Targaryen.
flavor: "The Dothraki say a man and his bloodriders share one life, and Qotho sees it ending. A dead man is beyond fear."

name: âˆž Blue-Lipped Warlock
text: Blue-Lipped Warlock does not kneel to attack. Dominance: return Blue-Lipped Warlock from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

name: Bloodthirsty Khal
text: Stealth.
flavor: Challenges: kneel 1 influence to give Bloodthirsty Khal +X STR until the end of the phase. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile. [doomed]

name: Dany's Handmaiden
text: Response: after Daenerys Targaryen or Dany's Handmaiden is killed, choose and discard an attachment from play.
flavor: The girl brushed her hair until it shone like molten silver, while the old woman annointed her with spiceflower perfume of the Dothraki plains.

name: Minor Khalasar
text: No attachments. Deadly. Challenges: kill Minor Khalasar (cannot be saved) to choose a defending character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

name: Narrow Sea Trader
text: While there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play, Narrow Sea Trader gains "Response: after you play Narrow Sea Trader from your hand, choose and discard an attachment from play."

name: Westerosi Informant
text: While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Westerosi Informant gains "Marshalling: kneel to lower the cost of the next [targaryen] attachment you play this phase by 2."

name: Delicate Stomach
text: Response: after you lose a challenge, kneel attached character. Discard all other attachments and power from attached character.
flavor: "Pray tell me, when will justice be served?" -Prince Oberyn Martell

name: Hooked Spear
text: While attached character is participating in a challenge, it gains "Challenges: kneel 1 influence to choose and discard from play a Weapon or Item attachment on a participating character."

name: Vainglorious
text: Attached character gets -1 STR for each icon it has.
flavor: "The Fat Flower thrust him into the tourney at too tender an age, just as he did with the other two. He wanted another Leo Longhorn, and made himself a cripple."

name: Darkstar
text: While Darkstar is attacking or defending alone, he gets +1 STR, gains deadly and gains "Response: after a character is killed, draw 2 cards."

name: Nymeria Sand
text: Response: kneel 1 influence to cancel a triggered effect that chooses a Sand Snake character as a target. Then, stand Nymeria Sand. [doomed]

name: âˆž Son of the Red Viper
traits: Stealth. Deadly. Dominance: return Son of the Red Viper from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

name: Doran's Honor Guard
text: No attachments. Deadly. While there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play, Doran's Honor Guard gains "Response: after you play Doran's Honor Guard from your hand, draw 2 cards."

name: Far-Seeing Scholar
text: While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Far-Seeing Scholar gains deadly.
flavor: He had studied at the Citadel, going so far as to forge six links of a maester's chain before he grew bored.

name: House Dayne Skirmisher
text: No attachments. Any phase: kill House Dayne Skirmisher (cannot be saved) to draw a card. Then, each opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.

name: Oberyn's Lover
text: Response: after The Red Viper or Oberyn's Lover is killed, choose a [martell] character to gain stealth, a [military] and an [intrigue] icon until the end of the phase.

name: Prince's Loyalist
text: Stealth. Immune to events. Response: kneel 1 influence to cancel a triggered character ability with influence cost X or lower. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile. [doomed]

name: Remote Oasis
text: Discard Remote Oasis from play at any time there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play. Response: after a player wins a challenge against you, he or she must choose and discard a card from his or her hand.
